## `logit` 

```{stata logit1, echo = F}
quietly{
  use "./data/BIBBBAuA_2018_short.dta", clear
  set linesize 200
}
```


```{stata logit2, echo = F}
noisily estout, /// 
  label mlabel("(1)" "(2)" "(3)" "(4)" "(5)" "(6)" "(7)" "(8)") style(tex) collabels(none) varwidth(52) ///
  cells(b(star fmt(4)) se(par fmt(3))) starlevels(*** 0.00000000000000001)/*(* 0.10 ** 0.05 *** 0.01)*/ ///
  keep($xvar) ///
  stats(ShiftShareSE pval N r2, fmt(3 3 0 3) label("Shift Share s.e." "p-value" "N" "R$^2$"))

esttab iv_fem0_5 iv_fem1_5 using "$output/FD_Wages_WZWGxtime-FE_laggedDAS_Mindestlohn_2014+15.tex", se /*booktabs*/ nonum /*label*/ append keep(L2.del_refg_av_b13) scalar("N Observations" widstat) ///
	star(* 0.10 ** 0.05 *** 0.01) fragment prehead( "\toprule" "\multicolumn{3}{l}{Wages in Tradable Sectors}\\")
```

```{stata groups, eval = F}
stats(N_g, labels("N")) // anzahl der Cluster/Gruppen
```

### ICC hinzufügen



```{stata mixed1, eval = F}
webuse pig
xtmixed weight week || id: week
estat icc
estadd scalar icc2 = r(icc2) // Use 'return list' to check for other scalars from 'estaticc' you might want
esttab, se wide nostar transform(ln*: exp(@) exp(@)) ///
    eqlabels("" "sd(week)" "sd(_cons)" "sd(Residual)", none) ///
    varlabels(,elist(weight:_cons "{break}{hline @width}")) ///
    varwidth(13) scalars(icc2)
```
